en.title: For First-Time Cat Owners | A Complete Guide from Preparation to Care
en.content:
Getting a cat for the first time is exciting but can also be nerve-wracking. This article covers everything you need to know to start life with a cat.

Mindset Before Getting a Cat

A cat's lifespan is 15 to 20 years. Be prepared to welcome a lifelong companion. Financial preparation is also necessary, including monthly food costs, regular medical expenses, and a fund for unexpected illness.

Choosing a Breed

It is important to choose a breed that fits your lifestyle. For beginners, calm and friendly breeds such as Siberians, British Shorthairs, and Ragdolls are recommended.

Estimated Monthly Costs

A rough guide is 3,000 to 5,000 yen for food, 1,000 to 2,000 yen for cat litter, and 3,000 to 5,000 yen set aside for medical expenses. Don't forget the annual checkup (5,000 to 15,000 yen).

Fuluck Cattery's Support for First-Time Owners

First-time cat owners are absolutely welcome. We hand over gentle kittens that have undergone socialization training, and you can consult us about anything via LINE after adoption. We also provide a care guide and written instructions, so you can bring your kitten home with confidence.

zh.title: 写给第一次养猫的你 | 从准备到饲养的完全指南
zh.content:
第一次养猫既令人兴奋又有些紧张。本文将全面介绍开始与猫咪一起生活所需了解的一切。

养猫前的心理准备

猫的寿命为15到20年。请怀着迎接一生伴侣的心态来准备。每月的猫粮费、定期医疗费和应对突发疾病的储备金等经济准备也是必要的。

选择品种

选择适合自己生活方式的品种非常重要。对于新手来说，推荐性格温和、亲人的品种，如西伯利亚猫、英国短毛猫和布偶猫。

每月费用参考

大致费用：猫粮3,000至5,000日元，猫砂1,000至2,000日元，医疗储备金3,000至5,000日元。别忘了每年一次的定期体检（5,000至15,000日元）。

福楽猫舍对新手的支持

我们非常欢迎第一次养猫的朋友。我们交付的小猫都经过社会化训练、性格温顺，领养后您可以通过LINE随时咨询任何问题。我们还提供饲养说明书和护理指南，让您安心迎接小猫。
